name: UpdateUserTeamMembership
description:
Update a user's membership attributes on a team.

Use this tool to update specific membership attributes for a user within a team's membership in Datadog. This can be useful when user roles or permissions need modification.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team to update the user's membership attributes.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the user whose membership is being updated. This is required to specify which user's attributes will be changed.

parameters.name: team_membership_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of team membership. The value must be 'team_memberships'.

parameters.name: provisioning_mechanism
parameters.description: Specifies how the team relationship was provisioned. Options: null, "service_account", "saml_mapping".

value_schema.description:
The mechanism responsible for provisioning the team relationship.
Possible values: null for added by a user, "service_account" if added by a service account, and "saml_mapping" if provisioned via SAML mapping.

parameters.name: provisioning_identifier
parameters.description: UUID of the User or Service Account who provisioned this team membership, or null if provisioned via SAML mapping.

value_schema.description: UUID of the User or Service Account who provisioned this team membership, or null if provisioned via SAML mapping.

parameters.name: user_role_in_team
parameters.description: Specify the user's role within the team. Accepts 'admin'.

value_schema.description: The user's role within the team

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.provisioned_by
parameters.description:
The mechanism responsible for provisioning the team relationship.
Possible values: null for added by a user, "service_account" if added by a service account, and "saml_mapping" if provisioned via SAML mapping.

value_schema.description:
The mechanism responsible for provisioning the team relationship.
Possible values: null for added by a user, "service_account" if added by a service account, and "saml_mapping" if provisioned via SAML mapping.

parameters.name: data.attributes.provisioned_by_id
parameters.description: UUID of the User or Service Account who provisioned this team membership, or null if provisioned via SAML mapping.

value_schema.description: UUID of the User or Service Account who provisioned this team membership, or null if provisioned via SAML mapping.

parameters.name: data.attributes.role
parameters.description: The user's role within the team

value_schema.description: The user's role within the team
